# `break` for [core](/commands/categories/core.md)

<div class='command-title'>Break a loop.</div>

## Signature

```> break {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output  |
| ------- | ------- |
| nothing | nothing |

## Examples

Break out of a loop
```nu
> loop { break }

```
